text: Amy Schumer is undeniably funny, so why have her two latest films underperformed? The comedian ’ s third starring vehicle “ I Feel Pretty, ” written and directed by Marc Silverstein and Abby Kohn, launched to a soft $ 16 million last weekend. It ’ s not a disaster, but it does represent Schumer ’ s lowest opening for a film yet. “ In terms of her career trajectory, it ’ s been a declining scale, ” box office analyst Jeff Bock said. “ It ’ s a matter of her finding her feet. She ’ s relatively new on the scene. ” The comedian made her film debut alongside Bill Hader in 2015 ’ s hit “ Trainwreck. ” The incisive rom - com, written by Schumer and directed by Judd Apato
